channel.title: How To change exp rate plz help
channel.description: how can i change exp rates in like ::train , u can click range targets statues and stuff ... but am using a source with very low exp .. how can i higher it up?

item.title: How To change exp rate plz help
item.dc:creator: @guku116 guku116
item.description:

ye i know its really really strange i do everything right exp higher … really strange thank u anyway for taking ur time to help me [br][size=1]Posted on: September 30, 2007, 09:09:49 AM[/size][hr]i just found out something … i changed starter pack … it was 200k … i changed it too 20M
and its just still the same maybe something wrong with compiler?

item.title: How To change exp rate plz help
item.dc:creator: @guku116 guku116
item.description:
@guku116 wrote:

ok thx[br][size=1]Posted on: September 30, 2007, 08:53:01 AM[/size][hr]i really dont wana be a pain in the ass but :

case 2513:
if(actionTimer == 0) { // start of dan training and portals …
sendMessage(“You shoot at the target!”);
actionName = “range1”;
actionTimer = 20;
setAnimation(426);
addSkillXP((1500*playerLevel[4]), 4);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
break;

still getting 50 exp what chat sytem do u use

Read full topic

Find case 2513 or case 2514 and edit those XP values, then save, compile, and run.

item.title: How To change exp rate plz help
item.dc:creator: @guku116 guku116
item.description:
@guku116 wrote:

case 2874:
if(actionTimer == 0) {
sendMessage(“You train Strenght !”);
actionTimer = 53;
setAnimation(2555);
addSkillXP((15000playerLevel[2]), 2);
addSkillXP((15000playerLevel[3]), 3);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
break;

case 2875:
if(actionTimer == 0) {
sendMessage(“You train Def !”);
actionTimer = 53;
setAnimation(1978);
addSkillXP((1500playerLevel[3]), 3);
addSkillXP((1500playerLevel[1]), 1);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
break; … thats what i did en i when i click the thing with the right id i still get 50 exp

item.title: How To change exp rate plz help
item.dc:creator: @Waffles1 Waffles!!
item.description:
@Waffles1 wrote:

Ha Ethan. I remember when you were a noob, with 10 rep. Everyone flamed you. Now that you’re 29 rep, you flame everyone else.

On topic -
Go into client.java and search the case of the object you click.
case 823: - Dummy

To get the case, go to ::train, and right click the object. On mopar’s client, it’ll show the id and the coords.

Read full topic

If that doesnt work then im stupid
